services.title: Scooty Rental
services.description: Scooter rental services in Guwahati offer a convenient way for locals or tourists to explore the city. There are many options for renting scooties available in Guwahati, with prices ranging from INR 300-500 per day depending on the make and model of the scooter.
features: We also deliver scooters to your doorstep on request
You can easily rent scooters for a day, a week or more, depending on your travel needs
When renting a scooter, ensure that you have the necessary licenses and identity proofs
Always wear a helmet to ensure your safety
services.conclusion: Overall, renting a scooty is a convenient, affordable and popular mode of transportation in Guwahati.

services.title: Bike rental in Guwahati
services.description: Premium motorcycle rental service for adventure enthusiasts and daily commuters in Guwahati.

services.title: Rent a car
services.description: Self-drive car rental service with a wide range of vehicles for every need.

services.title: Rental cabs and Tempo travellers
services.description: Professional cab booking and tempo traveller rental for group travel and tours.

faq.question: What are the documents required to rent a self drive ?
faq.answer: Guest need to provide a soft copy of his or her driving license and adhaar card. Our team will verify it and proceed further.

faq.question: Where do i need to drop the self drive car or bike ?
faq.answer: Guest has the liberty to choose its own pickup and drop off location. A convenience fee is applicable.

faq.question: Can my friend receive the car in my absence ?
faq.answer: Yes Ofcourse in absence of guest, his or her friend who has valid driving license and adhaar card can receive the car or bike. Please mention the same while booking.

faq.question: What if I damage the vehicle during rental period ?
faq.answer: Any damage caused to the vehicle during rental period will be charged as per actual repair cost. We recommend careful driving and parking in safe locations.

faq.question: Is fuel included in the rental price ?
faq.answer: No, fuel is not included in the rental price. The vehicle will be delivered with fuel and should be returned with the same fuel level.

faq.question: What are the age requirements for renting ?
faq.answer: Minimum age requirement is 18 years for two-wheelers and 21 years for four-wheelers. A valid driving license is mandatory.
